title: NYX Cosmetics Matte Nail Polish , Sky Blue ,  1.76 Ounce
description: Add a little avant-garde twist to your everyday manicure and pedicure with NYX's new matte nail polish. This formula features 16 on-trend colors with a rich and velvety texture. When applied and dries quickly with the perfect matte finish. Your fingers and toes will look far from lackluster.

title: Physicians Formula Shimmer Strips Custom Eye Enhancing Gel Cream Liner, Brown Eyes, 0.21 oz
description: * Three custom shades provide a glamorous look to define and enhance your eye color.* Unique gel cream formula glides-on effortlessly and smoothly while providing the definition of a liquid eyeliner.* Long-wearing, water-resistant and smudge-resistant formula provides 24-Hour definition.* Includes Pro-Eyeliner Brush for effortless and precise application.* Stackable eyeliner pots can be pulled apart for individual use on-the-go.

title: Tarte Cosmetics Lights Camera Splashes 4-in-1 Waterproof Natural Mascara 0.24 fl oz.
description: Tarte Cosmetics Lights Camera Splashes 4-in-1 Waterproof Mascara gives you bold, rich color and long-lasting resistance to all forms of moisture. Beeswax softens and nourishes your lashes while creating a natural moisture barrier to keep your lashes curled and extended. Botanically derived carnauba wax helps to lift and separate each strand for added volume. Black shade.
